Pre-Game Insights: Andrew Jett predicts the Atlanta Braves will win, but notes the line is too thick to bet on in reality.
Chris Sale has a 2-0 record over his last three starts, with just three earned runs in 20.0 total innings.
Yariel Rodriguez has given up 11 earned runs in his last 12.1 innings of work, going 0-1 in his last trio.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Toronto Blue Jays and the Atlanta Braves meet Sunday in MLB action from Truist Park.
The Braves gave up three runs in both the fourth and ninth innings on Saturday.
Sale really needs a lengthy outing here, as Atlanta used six pitchers in their game two losing effort.
Others: The Braves rank 29th in the league for steals this season (61).
The Braves rank 2nd in the league for ERA this season (3.56).
The Blue Jays rank 5th in the league for doubles this season (256).
The Blue Jays rank 6th in the league for strikeouts against this season (1081).
